Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Cumadcad Emergency Hospital in Barangay Cumadcad, Municipality of Castilla, Province of Sorsogon, to Vicente L. Peralta Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 124
An Act Changing the Name of the Cumadcad Emergency Hospital in Barangay Cumadcad, Municipality of Castilla, Province of Sorsogon, to Vicente L. Peralta Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Cumadcad Emergency Hospital in Barangay Cumadcad, Municipality of Castilla, Province of Sorsogon, is hereby changed to Vicente L. Peralta Memorial Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 10, 1981
